attributes.action: Release all African Countries From there Debt.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
11 Million Children each year die from poverty because of the debt. These countries cannot develop without your help.
Africa has over $500 billion of debt. the same cost of the War on terror. Every doller a country borrows they have to pay back $13. Its wrong.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
